checklistDescription: TODO Items for new members of dev team.

checkCalendars.description: Double check with your buddy or facilitator to make sure you have been added to the Dev calendar.

addToListservs.description: Your facilitator should have added you to the #dev listserv. Double check to make sure you've been added.

firstCheckIn.description: Your facilitator will arrange an introductory meeting with you. See topics for introductory meetings if you need inspiration.

runLaptop.description: Run the laptop script. This is not obligatory if you prefer to manage your machine setup a different way.

meetFacilitatorTeam.description: Your facilitator will introduce you to your facilitator team.

addStaffSkills.description: We use Float as a method for tracking work hours across projects. If you have not been given access to Float, go to #admins-float to request access.

setUpGitHub.description: You should have received instructions via Dolores to set up your 18F GitHub account. Instructions are here.

learnGitHub.description: If not already comfortable with Git/GitHub, go through a tutorial (e.g. this one.

attendFacilitatorGroupMeeting.description: During your first week, you'll meet your Facilitator team and then go to the group meeting.

ReadBeforeYouShip.description: We require anyone who works with dev, devops, product, infrastucture, and design to read our Before You Ship guide. Please make sure you've read the section on ATOs and if you have any questions, please ask in #devops.

lookAtProjects.description: Your facilitator and director will talk to you about the project you'll be staffed on. If you are in need of a short-term project, look at Open Opportunities, specifically 18F's open tasks.

cloudGov.description: Your facilitator and director will talk to you about cloud.gov. Look at Cloud.gov and go to cloud.gov with questions.

deploycloudGov.description: Deploy a sample application to learn about Cloud Foundry. Instructions.

performancePlanMeeting.description: You will meet with your director and facilitator to discuss your Performance Plan. You will also meet with your facilitator to create OKRs.

techTalkSignUp.description: Sign up for a tech talk. Ask your facilitator any questions you may have.

giveHiringFeedback.description: Your director and facilitator will ask you for feedback on your hiring process, so that they may improve it for others.

becomeInterviewer.description: If and when you're comfortable, your director will set you up with a veteran inteviewer to conduct interviews for 18F.
